channel.description: Recent content in projects on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Unbiased mixed variables distance (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review - arXiv - SSRN An Exact Solution Approach for Hierarchical Clustering (Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W. and van de Velden, M.) - Revision submitted Ultrametric Factor Analysis for building hierarchies of reliable and unidimensional latent concepts (Bottazzi Schenone, M.
